videos.description: Kemba Walker cuts through the Hawks' defense and finishes with the acrobatic layup to put the Hornets up three in the fourth quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kemba twists and turns for unbelievable layup) 2016/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kemba twists and turns for unbelievable layup
